definition: to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The stability of colour and depth of shade were improved by after-treatment.
sentences.chinese: 通过后处理提高了热转印布样的颜色稳定性和深度。

sentences.english: Soybean isoflavones and procyanidins have be provided with reliable storage stability in Health Vino.
sentences.chinese: 大豆异黄酮与原花青素在保健酒中具有较好的稳定性。

sentences.english: The adaptive law using stability theory is derived.
sentences.chinese: 按李雅普诺夫稳定性理论设计自适应控制器。

sentences.english: It need quite a long time return to the former stability after rain, 5.
sentences.chinese: 降雨过后相当长时间，滑坡才能恢复到雨前的稳定性。

sentences.english: Limitedly resistant to strong acid, strong alkali, strong oxidizing solution and strong solvent.
sentences.chinese: 而且更具有很高的热稳定性，抗强碱性及抗强溶剂性。

sentences.english: The molecular sieve pretreated by alkali can improve the stability of catalysts obviously.
sentences.chinese: 分子筛预先经碱处理，能够明显改善催化剂稳定性。

sentences.english: EVOIL? ALMOND exhibits greater stability over time due to the addition of natural tocopherols.
sentences.chinese: 通过添加天然生育酚，甜杏仁油的稳定性很强。

sentences.english: The results show that the vortex motion is unstable for small three-dimensional disturbances in the separated wake of a circular cylinder.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，圆柱分离尾迹中的旋涡存在三维不稳定性。

sentences.english: As a result, significantly impact on the stability of the solder.
sentences.chinese: 这样一来，就大大影响了焊锡的稳定性。

sentences.english: The instability of morphological variation in flower of Z. grandiflora might be related to transposable genetic element.
sentences.chinese: 花形变异的不稳定性可能与转座遗传因子有关。

sentences.english: Sufficiant condition for stability of equilibrium states is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 分析了平衡状态稳定性的充分条件。

sentences.english: Vert bikes are relatively heavy for stability and control.
sentences.chinese: 垂直自行车相对较重的稳定性和控制。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To investigate the effect of butyl rubber stopper on the stability of procaine hydrochloride injection.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究丁基橡胶塞对普鲁卡因注射液稳定性的影响。

sentences.english: This paper also discussed the mechanism of excellent stability of fluorine-containing organic radicals at roo…
sentences.chinese: 并讨论了含氟有机自由基的良好室温稳定性的机理。

sentences.english: Disequilibrium push method is applied to stability evaluation of landslide under seepage forces.
sentences.chinese: 建立了渗透力作用下滑坡稳定性评价的不平衡推力法。

sentences.english: Objective To study the features of stilbene glycoside's stability.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究二苯乙烯苷体外稳定性的特征。
